statements: DELETE FROM patient_profile WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patient_profile WHERE gender = 'Male' AND birth_date = '1990-05-20';
DELETE FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Common cold' AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM HealthRecords WHERE patient_id = 100 AND visit_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE appointment_reason = 'Regular checkup';
DELETE FROM HealthRecords WHERE patient_id = 101 AND diagnosis_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ImagingReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-03-15' AND image_id IN (SELECT id FROM ImagingData WHERE patient_id = 202);
